recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. In a pan, sauté onions and garlic until translucent.
3. Add ground beef and cook until browned.
4. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
5. Serve sauce over spaghetti and garnish with parsley.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
2. Grill or bake the chicken until slightly charred.
3. In a pot, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
4. Add tomato puree and cream, then simmer.
5. Add cooked chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook egg noodles and set aside.
2. In a pan, sauté mushrooms and onions until golden.
3. Add beef strips and cook until browned.
4. Stir in sour cream and mustard, then simmer.
5. Serve over egg noodles and garnish with parsley.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions:
1. Tear romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
2. Toss with Caesar dressing, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.
3. Add grilled chicken for a hearty variation.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions:
1. Heat oil in a wok or pan over high heat.
2. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry until fragrant.
3. Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp.
4. Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil.
5. Serve with steamed rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Beef and Mustard Pie
recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven.
2. Prepare the beef filling with mustard and spices.
3. Roll out the pastry.
4. Add filling and bake until golden brown.

recipes.title: Arrabiata Pasta
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta until al dente.
2. Sauté garlic in olive oil.
3. Add chili flakes and tomato sauce.
4. Mix cooked pasta with the sauce and serve hot.
